name: Pew Pew Eyes
description:
A shooter where you can't shoot your enemies. But you can reflect lasers to defeat those creepy pew pew eyes. You can't kill a pew pew eye with its own laser though, so keep up the friendly fire!

Move with WASD 

Hold up shield with LMB 

Slow down time with RMB 

pew pew pew <3 <3 <3
